channel.title: [PI] Client freezes upon Login because of Golden Mining Armour
channel.description: Please help me fix this error... the armour looks so god damn sexy! [code]602 Animation Amount: 13798 508 Object Amount: 38424 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Width: 560 Height: 165 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20787 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:173) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:656) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10900) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2971) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10580) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11567) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:173) at client.run(client.java:6352) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
